remarks: Ring addition operation for the constructed partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvafvsca.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvafvsca.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvsca.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvsca.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvsca.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dvafvsca $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .x. = ( s e. E , f e. T |-> ( s ` f ) ) ) $.
$d E f s $.
$d K f s $.
$d T f s $.
$d W f s $.
